enhanced_by.reason: The toString method relies on the state of the object, which can be influenced by the getChangedElements method.
The toString method may need to reflect changes identified by the isCoreChanged method.
Both toString and equals methods provide a representation of the object's state, making assertions on the toString output more robust when informed by the equals method.
The hashCode method provides a different representation of the object's state, which can be used to cross-verify the consistency of the toString output.
